title: Window treatments, Outdoor fire pit, Pendant lighting
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 93', 'OR Text', '93', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 757 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'At Veranda, we deliver a premier location, impeccable design, gorgeous apartments, upgrades galore, larger-than-life amenities and exclusive resident perks.', 'It’s the best of downtown living – without the downtown price tag.', 'Check out our apartments today.', 'From expansive studios to downright huge three-bedroom layouts, we’re sure to have the perfect place for you to call ‘Viva Veranda!’', 'Features:', 'Walk-in closets and ample storage, Wired for high-speed Internet, Glass tile accents*, Granite countertops in kitchen + baths, Custom cabinetry, Tech shelves + USB ports, Eco-friendly wood plank-style flooring, Window treatments, Front-loading full-size washer + dryer, Soaking tub with custom tile surround, Mountain + city views*, Stainless steel appliances*, Studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments, Pendant lighting, Spacious, open layouts up to 1, 300+ square feet, Designer paint schemes, Black-on-black appliance package, Programmable thermostat, Private patio or balcony', '* some apartments', 'Community Amenities:', "Business Center, Garage parking with direct access, Outdoor fire pit, 24-hour Package concierge, Free wi-fi in social areas, Yoga studio, Denver's only lazy river (heated year-around), 100% smoke-free living, Decked-out gaming + party room, Dog- and cat-friendly, Club-quality cardio equipment with individual TVs, Rooftop deck with breathtaking mountain + city views, Free yoga classes for residents, Outdoor kitchen with BBQ grills, VINE Community Garden, Expansive 24-hour fitness studio, Social /catering kitchen, The Nikko Rooftop Lounge, Multi-media conference room, Basketball court, Dedicated dog park, Complimentary coffee bar", 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'lIagFd7MV2R']
